titleStmt.title: A discourse of death, bodily, ghostly, and eternall nor vnfit for souldiers warring, seamen sayling, strangers trauelling, women bearing, nor any other liuing that thinkes of dying. By Thomas Tuke.
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansbie for George Norton,

notesStmt.note: Some print faded and show-through; some pages marked and stained.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
